article_title: Comer concedes, pledges to work on GOP gubernatorial rival Matt Bevin's behalf
article_text: James Comer conceded, Matt Bevin accepted and Kentucky's race for governor finally got underway Friday following a tumultuous primary that left Democrats giddy and Republicans focused on uniting their scattered base.
